DOC.brief_summary: Paris Saint Joseph hospital acquire new echocardiography EPIC . This new system image processing leave ventricular function quantification software different precedent model Philips IE33.Left ventricular function quantification myocardial distortion main medical examination influence doctor 's decision . EPIC evaluate quantify cardiac ejection fraction via new software . Myocardial distortion quantification software also modify new cut different calculation method . The aim study compare quality image quantification cardiac ejection fraction new software order choose reliable reproducible patient .
DOC.criteria: patient accept stay 15 min Age > 18 year old patient accepting procedure
